description: A simple tag button with optional image/icon and remove button

props.name: disabled
props.description: Dims the tag and hides the remove button

props.name: html
props.description:
If set to `true`, the `text` is rendered as HTML code,
otherwise as plain text

props.name: link
props.description: Sets a link on the tag. Link can be absolute or relative.

props.name: text
props.description: Text to display in the bubble

events.name: remove
events.description:
Remove button is being clicked
or the tag is focussed and the delete key is entered.

slots.name: image
slots.description: Replaces the image/icon frame created via the `image` prop
